title: 随机传送插件普通玩家无权限
txt_content:
本帖最后由 12557584841 于 2020-4-24 20:25 编辑 

服务端内装载 BetterRTP 插件，和 GroupManager 权限插件
给权限完之后，普通玩家还是不能传送，
有试过直接修改文件和输入指令，给了两个权限
betterrtp.use
betterrtp.world.*
就只有use能使用
以下是 GroupManager 的权限文件

# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  vip4:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - betterrtp.use
    - betterrtp.world.*
    - betterrtp.world.LD
    - chestcommands.item.会员菜单.yml
    - chestcommands.open.会员菜单.yml
    - EasyKits.kits.vip
    - EasyKits.kits.vip4
    - essentials.enderchest
    - essentials.fly
    - essentials.hat
    - essentials.workbench
    - rainbow
    - rainbowchat.scheme.gray
    - rainbowchat.scheme.rgby
    inheritance:
    - builder
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&9&l【侯爵】'
      suffix: ''
  vip3:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - betterrtp.use
    - betterrtp.world.*
    - betterrtp.world.LD
    - chestcommands.item.会员菜单.yml
    - chestcommands.open.会员菜单.yml
    - EasyKits.kits.vip
    - EasyKits.kits.vip3
    - essentials.enderchest
    - essentials.fly
    - essentials.hat
    - essentials.workbench
    - rainbowchat.scheme.gray
    - rainbowchat.scheme.rgby
    inheritance:
    - builder
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&c&l【伯爵】'
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&5'
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - +vanish.effects.toggle.all
    - -vanish.effects.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&4'
      suffix: ''
  vip2:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - betterrtp.use
    - betterrtp.world.*
    - betterrtp.world.LD
    - chestcommands.item.会员菜单.yml
    - chestcommands.open.会员菜单.yml
    - EasyKits.kits.vip
    - EasyKits.kits.vip2
    - essentials.enderchest
    - essentials.hat
    - essentials.workbench
    - rainbowchat.scheme.gray
    - rainbowchat.scheme.rgby
    inheritance:
    - builder
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&b&l【子爵】'
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -plots.set.flag.gamemode
    - -plots.set.flag.gamemode.creative
    - -plots.set.flag.gamemode.survival
    - -plots.set.flag.gamemode.adventure
    - betterrtp.use
    - betterrtp.world.*
    - betterrtp.world.LD
    - chestcommands.item.主菜单.yml
    - chestcommands.item.菜单.yml
    - chestcommands.open.主菜单.yml
    - plots.deny.*
    - plots.permpack.basic
    - plots.permpack.basicflags
    - plots.plot.1
    - plots.use
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&2'
      suffix: ''
  VIP1:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - betterrtp.use
    - betterrtp.world.*
    - betterrtp.world.LD
    - chestcommands.item.会员菜单.yml
    - chestcommands.open.会员菜单.yml
    - EasyKits.kits.vip
    - EasyKits.kits.vip1
    - essentials.workbench
    - rainbowchat.scheme.gray
    inheritance:
    - builder
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&a&l【男爵】'
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&c'
      suffix: ''
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&e'
      suffix: ''
  vip5:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - betterrtp.use
    - betterrtp.world.*
    - betterrtp.world.LD
    - chestcommands.item.会员菜单.yml
    - chestcommands.open.会员菜单.yml
    - EasyKits.kits.vip
    - EasyKits.kits.vip5
    - essentials.enderchest
    - essentials.fly
    - essentials.hat
    - essentials.workbench
    - rainbow
    - rainbowchat.scheme.gray
    - rainbowchat.scheme.rgby
    inheritance:
    - builder
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&e&l【公爵】'
      suffix: ''复制代码

（补充，除了op都任何一个权限组无法使用）

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
12557584841 发表于 2020-4-24 20:16
不是，是可以用rtp，但是不能用rtp world
再多给betterrtp.world.world权限呢

replies.author: lengshao233
replies.txt_content: 确保rtp配置文件内的配置文件世界是玩家所在世界

replies.author: lengshao233
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 lengshao233 于 2020-4-24 20:03 编辑 

您可以通过，配置文件编辑

lengshao233 发表于 2020-4-24 19:58
确保rtp配置文件内的配置文件世界是玩家所在世界
是config里面的文件把，是在这里设置的嘛？
Override:
  world_nether: world
  creative: world
  world: LD
复制代码
